description: Try our easy to follow No-Churn Roasted Plum Ice-Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: NoChurn Roasted Plum IceCream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place mixture into a 20cm square container. Marble the mixture with remaining plum purée using a spoon to swirl through. Cover mixture and freeze for four hours or until set (see tip).
